item.title: Explore Kenting for Free with TPASS: Commute from Kaohsiung Main Station to Hengchun and Kenting â€“ All Free!
item.description: To save money on commuting between Kaohsiung and Tainan recently, I purchased the Southern Taiwan (Nangaoping) TPASS. This guide provides some strategies for exploring Kenting affordably. If you’re a foreigner visiting Taiwan and plan to stay in Southern Taiwan for close to a month, purchasing the TPASS is also highly recommended.
